solution_line_template: There are {slices_per_loaf} x {num_loaves} = <<{slices_per_loaf}*{num_loaves}={total_slices}>>{total_slices} slices of bread in {num_loaves} loaves of bread.
Hence, each of them ate {total_slices}/{num_friends} = <<{total_slices}/{num_friends}={slices_per_friend}>>{slices_per_friend} slices of bread.
